arts.ttl: Chelsea 'accelerate £42m transfer pursuit' of La Liga teenager who haunted Real Madrid
arts.sum: Chelsea are supposedly running the rule over teenage Real Betis winger Jesus Rodriguez, who is starting to make a name for himself under Manuel Pellegrini.

arts.ttl: Joe Cole names the 'world-class' Chelsea star he wants back in England squad after two-year absence - ahead of Thomas Tuchel's first selection
arts.sum: Chelsea have arrived as strong favourites at the Parken stadium despite their heavy squad rotation as manager Enzo Maresca appeared to provide the club's youth an opportunity.

arts.ttl: Chelsea squad costliest ever assembled as PL clubs dominate UEFA list
arts.sum: Chelsea’s squad at the end of the 2024 financial year was the costliest ever assembled, according to a new UEFA report.

arts.ttl: Chelsea plot shock £42m Real Betis transfer as Antony passes Man Utd transfer audition
arts.sum: According to the MailOnline, Chelsea are interested in signing Jesus Rodriguez from Real Betis, who's 'caught the eye of elite scouts' since breaking into Manuel Pellegrini's side. Rodriguez has started each of Real Betis' last seven games in the Spanish top-flight.

arts.ttl: Maresca may have pulled off Chelsea transfer masterstroke with double deal
arts.sum: Aston Villa signed three players on loan during the latter stages of this winter's transfer window. With those deals done, Axel Disasi perhaps surprisingly became one of the stars of transfer deadline day after being seemingly at one stage set to sign for Tottenham Hotspur before a move to Villa belatedly materialised.

arts.ttl: Chelsea's next five fixtures compared to Premier League rivals after nervy Copenhagen win
arts.sum: The Blues will host Leicester City at Stamford Bridge on Sunday afternoon as they both look to climb the Premier League table . Leicester City (H) – Premier League – Sunday, March 9

arts.ttl: Maresca says he sees Chelsea captain James as a ‘midfielder’
arts.sum: Enzo Maresca has said he sees Reece James as a midfielder after the Chelsea’s captain’s impressive performance in the club’s win at FC Copenhagen. Chelsea secured a 2-1 lead to take back to Stamford Bridge in the first leg of their Europa Conference League last-16 tie.
